name: Escape Z Town
summary:
Escape Z Town is a role-playing game with turn-based combat about escaping a zombie-infested city.
The player finds himself in the middle of a town filled with zombies, bandits and marauders. To survive in this dangerous place, you need to find weapons and supplies, fight against a huge variety of enemies, find loyal comrades, improve your skills and abilities and find a way to escape from 'Z Town'.
The game can be quite challenging for casual players.
